title: The Director's Cut
description: Ready for your close up?... Issy and James have survived dangers and challenges to their relationship. But now the cameras are rolling, a new threat could ruin everything. With Isabella, sparkling behind the camera, and James smouldering behind it, life on set is sexy and explosive. So when a malicious press leak, could end filming, their chance of a real relationship is suddenly in jeopardy.
author: J.S.  Taylor
